A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Nonsensical plot-lines\, unexplained character actions and reactions and universe-defying \"new science\" make for a sloppy\, \"worst-yet\" Star Wars installment. Calling this story a bold move is about as generous a description as could possibly be merited. The film offers absolutely nothing in the way of character arch and ignores every speck of groundwork laid in \"The Force Awakens\". When stripped of its entertaining visuals and underlying nostalgia\, this film is nothing short of a complete disaster.
